note: Smelting ore requires specialized factilities. This can usually be accomplished in a fully equiped smithy, but consult your GM for where it might be appropriate. Adventurers rarely smelt their own ore, these are included primarily for informational purposes. Smelting magical ores may require more specialized facilities or locations.

materials: uncommon meat from a creature that deals poison damage
uncommon meat from a creature with a swimming speed greater than its walking speed
rare meat from a creature with an elemental resistance or immunity
uncommon or rarer meat from a creature that is immune to fire damage
ingredient from a creature with blindsight or tremorsense
